item.title: Trump transition live updates: Trump picks Waltz as national security adviser
item.description: Donald Trump is wasting no time in planning his return to the White House.

item.title: Laken Riley murder suspect waives jury trial, case to be decided by judge
item.description: The suspect accused of killing 22-year-old nursing student Laken Riley on the University of Georgia's campus has waived his right to a jury trial.

item.title: Judge blocks Louisiana law requiring the Ten Commandments in classrooms
item.description: Louisiana's new law requiring all public school classrooms to display the Ten Commandments was temporarily blocked on Tuesday.

item.title: Johnson, GOP leaders take victory lap and say they're ready for Day 1 under Trump
item.description: House Republican leaders took a victory lap as they returned to Washington, saying they are ready on Day 1 to work on President-elect Donald Trump's a...
